SEARCH
Package src.cli

Class LoginUserMenu

java.lang.Object
src.cli.LoginUserMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Login, Menu
public class LoginUserMenu extends Object implements Menu, Login
A menu that allows users to login and access their respective accounts. Implements the Menu and Login interfaces.

  • Method Details

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the login menu and allows users to login. Depending on the userType, it will call the respective login method.
      Specified by:
      display in interface Menu

    • loginStudent

      public StudentAccount loginStudent(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the login details of a StudentAccount.
      Parameters:
      username - the username entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      the StudentAccount if the login is successful, null if not successful

    • loginSupervisorAccount

      public SupervisorAccount loginSupervisorAccount(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the login details of a SupervisorAccount.
      Parameters:
      username - the username entered by the user
      password - the password entered by the user
      Returns:
      the SupervisorAccount if login is successful, null otherwise

      Returns:
